page.title: 10Forest Lodge Aerial Mast.
page.content: Planning permission for a 42 metre high{telecommunications mast}at Forest Lodge,{Bransgore}has been refused.The Company concerned has revised the height of the mast to 30 metres and are awaiting permission.The purpose of the mast is to link in with a network of 500 needed for nationwide radio comminication to enable telephone calls to be made from vehicles.It is a rival to the British Telecom version called{Cellnet.}By eleven votes to two the Committee agreed to refuse the planning application and asked the firm to provide further information.
